Google Quick Search Box

Posted to Mottr.am by Jack on 10 June 2009. Tagged google and osx.

‘Alcor’, the genius behind Quicksilver worked on this, and it shows. Once more plugins become available (especially text manipulation ones) it might even–heresey!–replace QS on my Mac.
